Discover the convenience and fun of our Boat Share program for families Learn More Say Hello to Our Youtube Channel Watch Now Let us help you Sell Your Boat Sell Your Boat Welcome To Mount Dora Boating Center & Marina Mount Dora Boating Center is a full-service marina offering new and used boat sales, storage, rentals, and more! Our 2-acre facility is located on Lake Dora, which takes up about 28 of the over 148 square miles that make up the Harris Chain of Lakes. Mount Dora Boating Center is where boating begins, not only do we offer full marine services, but we educate our customers on all there is to know about boating as well. View All Testimonials Mount Dora Boating Center is amazing! Dustin and the staff were friendly, accommodating, knowledgeable, and made the entire experience from the beginning of the process of reserving the boat to getting on the water extremely smooth. My family and I had a great time. If you enjoy boating and being on the water, MDBC is the place to go! Anthony Ards Best experience. Nice, clean place with lots of boats to choose. Wonderful and helpful staff. Highly recommend! Michelle â€œShelleyâ€ Stepp Julia and her staff were amazing to work with! They have fantastic rental craft with superior customer service. The ins and outs of our particular boat were throughly explained to us, we were given a map of the Chain of Lakes, and they were waiting for us when we returned to help us dock the boat. They even have complimentary beach carts to use so you donâ€™t have to lug all of your gear to and from the parking lot. Every detail has been thought of by this group, highly recommend! Elite Veterinary Home Care Our family rented a pontoon boat this past weekend. The staff could not be more friendly and helpful. The boat was clean, fueled and ready to go. Great weekend thanks to Mount Dora Boating Center. Scott Leeds Did an all day Saturday rental of a Starcraft CX 23 pontoon boat and loved it. Excellent service and excellent equipment. Highly recommend renting the tube rental add on as itâ€™s a lot of fun. Luis Segarra Testimonial with Jeff Rubenthaul Subscribe to Our Newsletter Sign up for our newsletter to get a weekly digest. Email URL This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged. A full-service marina serving the beautiful Harris Chain of Lakes. Mount Dora Yacht Club 71st Regatta Regatta Mount Dora Yacht Club 71st Regatta Details Notice board Results Entry list Details Notices Results Entries Hosted by Mount Dora Yacht Club Mount Dora, FL Contact Host Date Location Mount Dora, FL, 32756, US View results Notice Board It's our 71st Annual Sailing Regatta! Thanks to all of our returning sailors! Early bird registration: at $50 ( $5 discount for US Sailing members) until February 4th 2024. Registration includes: *Skipper T-shirt (must specify size on registration ) *Meals: Catered Skipper's Dinner Saturday evening at MDYC, * Beverages ( yes, beer and wine for those of age), water, sodas. * Bagged breakfast/sailing snacks on both days. PLEASE NOTE: Boats with Crew- registration fee is increased $25 per crew and includes Skipper Dinner Saturday, beverages, and breakfast/snacks. Extra Crew Â T-shirts may be ordered. Adults- PLEASE put YOUR contact info under "guardian."(This is the address used for the waiver. Unfortunately, that is one area I can not edit on registration.) Crew will be emailed after registration to complete their waiver and information. Similar details to previous years' regattas with three courses. Youth Course, Open Class - Portsmouth course, and single design courses. (to be determined by registrations) Of course, we can't guarantee the weather, but we can guarantee the great hospitality of the MDYC and its membership! Here's to a terrific 71st Annual MDYC Sailing Regatta! Documents Uploaded Shop Click here to purchase   Mount Dora Yacht Club 71st Regatta merchandise . Entry List Crew list Find my entry All Classes Capri 16.5- fee includes two crew Catalina 22- Fee includes 2 crew Club 420-(fee includes one crew) Flying Scot- fee includes 1 crew Hobie Wave LASER (adult) Laser ( youth) Open -Multihull- additional $25each crew Open Class-Monohull -addt $25 each crew Optimist San Juan- fee includes One crew Scholastic 420- fee includes one crew Snipe ( includes one crew) Sailors Class Sail Number Boat Name Boat Type Handicap Rating Club / Org No entries yet. {{ number_of_entries }} previous next

Mount Dora Yacht Club MEMBER LOGIN Toggle navigation MENU Events Calendar of Events Regatta Rental Overview Photos Rental Inquiries Contact Contact Info & Directions Contact Form Member's Only Username: Password: The Mount Dora Yacht Club was established in 1913 and is the perfect venue for your special occasion. It is set in the heart of beautiful downtown Mount Dora. The Mount Dora Yacht Club offers spectacular views of Lake Dora with sunsets that are second to none. Our enchanting, spacious interior with floor to ceiling windows adds a timeless elegance to the intimacy of a small business function or the grandeur of a formal affair. Our venue is perfect for: Weddings Birthday Celebrations Business Meetings Client Appreciation Events Reunions Bridal and Baby Showers Club Meetings or luncheons Fashion Shows Fundraisers Amenities Available Private gated parking lot Bar Area Sound System with Wireless Microphone Dance Floor Tables and Chairs Chair Covers Screened Pavilion Viewing Deck overlooking Lake Dora Full Size Commercial Kitchen Dishes and Flatware B uilt-In Projector Screen Capacity for a non seated event: 150 guests Capacity for a seated plated dinner: 130 guests Capacity for a seated buffet dinner: 120 guests Rental Rates: (Final Invoice is due at least two weeks prior to event) Monday - Friday & Sunday Saturday & Holidays Half Day (5 Hours): $2,000Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Half Day (5 Hours) : $2,500 Full Day (9 Hours): $2,500Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Full Day (9 Hours) : $3,000 Security Deposit: $750 This is due as contract signing to hold your date, it is not applied towards your invoice, but will be returned upon completion of the event, as long as and no damages have occured. Add On's: Dock and Pavillion (when building is rented): $150 Remove and Replace furniture in pavillion or on balcony: $150 Bar: If drinks are served, a bartender will be provided. All achohol will come directly from the club. We can do the bar a multitude of ways, you could pick from our packages, which would give your guests an open bar. We could also do a cash bar, an open bar based off of consumtion, or a combination of the two with a ticket system! We can work around what you need, just let me know, and we can work with you! We do include all bar glassware fo no aditonal fee with use of our bar. O utside alcohol is stictly forbidden, it is against our liquor license, and will result in an automatic forfit of your deposit. Bartenders: $50 per bartender, per hour (2 bartenders required if over 65 guests are in attendance) Cash Bar Soda:Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â $3.00 Beer (Domestic):Â  Â  Â  $5.00 House Wine:Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  $8.00 Premium Wine:Â  Â  Â  Â  $9.00 House Liquor:Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  $9.00 Premium Liquor:Â  Â  Â $12.00 Bar Packages SodaÂ  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  $6.00pp Champagne ToastÂ  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  $4.00pp Beer, Wine & SodaÂ  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â $40.00pp Beer, Wine, Soda & SpiritsÂ  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â $50.00pp Beer, Wine, Soda, Premium Wine & SpiritsÂ  Â  Â  Â $65.00pp Million Dollar Event Liability insurance is required. See sales associate for further information. All rentals are subject to appropreate taxes. Contact Rentals Sales Associate today! Phone: 352.383.3188Â  Â  Â Email: manager@mountdorayachtclub.com 351 W. Fourth Ave.   Mount Dora, FL 32757 We do require a day of coodinator, someone who will be in charge of directing anything day of (coordinating with vendors, caterers, and the club manager), they will be required to be here from the start of the day, to the end of the day. They are also required to meet with the club manager at a minimum two weeks prior to the event. If you don't have one in mind, we can provide one for an additonal fee. We do not have a prefered caterer, so you're welcome to use whoever you'd like, including yourself if that's what you're looking for! If a caterer is used, they must provide a Certificate of Insurance, and take out the trash (your coodinator is respionsible for this if not caterer is used), and kitchen must be in the same condition as it was prior to use. Dishes & flatare are avialable for additonal fees, but we do not provide linens. The week before Thanksgiving each year, we decoarte for Christmas. These decorations must not be moved for events. 351 W. Fourth Ave. Mount Dora, Florida 32757 (352) 383-3188 manager@mountdorayachtclub.com Â© 2025 Mount Dora Yacht Club All rights reserved. Username: Password: < > Welcome to the Mount Dora Yacht Club Website! The Mount Dora Yacht Club is Florida's oldest inland Yacht Club. Located in beautiful Lake County, Florida, our clubhouse is nestled in the quaint town of Mount Dora along the banks of Lake Dora. Our goal is to provide an enjoyable atmosphere where we can gather for social events, promote water activities, and cultivate community relations. Sailing Regatta Save the Date 73rd
Annual Regatta March 21 & 22 2026 Earlybird Discount Weddings & Celebration s Events Calendar 351 W. Fourth Ave. Mount Dora, Florida 32757 (352) 383-3188 manager@mountdorayachtclub.com Â© 2025 Mount Dora Yacht Club All rights reserved. Hosting & Production by BusinessMasters.Net

Mount Dora Yacht Club (U.S.) This page is part of Â© FOTW Flags Of The World website Mount Dora Yacht Club (U.S.) Florida Last modified: 2020-01-04 by rick wyatt Keywords: mount dora yacht club | united states yacht club | florida | Links: FOTW homepage | search | disclaimer and copyright | write us | mirrors image by Rob Raeside , 16 May 2019 Description of the flag See also: Yacht Clubs' flags (index) U.S. Maritime flags Florida United States of America Description of the flag Estb: 1913. Location: 351 West 4th. Avenue, Mount Dora. Burgee: Pennant 
circa 6:9 (web image). Red field fimbriated blue on all sides and charged with a 
red letter D on a white equilateral triangle, based on hoist with sides of 4 
units, forming a blue pall to the fly point. "In 1913, Henry C. Fuller and a 
group of fellow boat owners met at his boathouse to discuss and make plans for 
organizing a yacht club. On May 26 of 1913, land was purchased at our present 
site. . . . The Club never closed its doors, even though World War II took a 
heavy toll on the membership. It remains the oldest inland waterways yacht club 
in Florida.Â” Source: accessed 14 May 2019, http://mountdoraregatta.com/HISTORY Peter Edwards , 15 May 2019 The Grand Traverse Yacht Club has a burgee of the Mount Dora where there's no 
blue along the hoist edge. Peter Hans van den Muijzenberg , 18 May 
2019

The Mount Dora Yacht Club offers spectacular views of Lake Dora with sunsets that are second to none. Our enchanting, spacious interior with floor to ceiling windows adds a timeless elegance to the intimacy of a small business function or the grandeur of a formal affair. Our Venue is Perfect: Weddings Birthday Celebrations Business Meetings Client Appreciation Events Reunions Bridal and Baby Showers Club Meetings or luncheons Fashion Shows Fundraisers Amenities Available: Private gated parking lot Bar Area Sound System with Wireless Microphone Dance Floor Tables and Chairs Chair Covers Screened Pavilion Viewing Deck overlooking Lake Dora Full-Size Commercial Kitchen Dishes and Flatware Built-In Projector Screen Capacity for a non-seated event: 150 guests Capacity for a seated plated dinner: 130 guests Capacity for a seated buffet dinner: 120 guests We do require a day of coordinator, someone who will be in charge of directing anything the day of (coordinating with vendors, caterers, and the club manager), they will be required to be here from the start of the day, to the end of the day. This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google Privacy Policy and Terms of Service apply. Gallery Upcoming Events Frequently Asked Questions What is the average price range for venue rental? We range from $2,000 â€“ $3,000 depending on the day of the week and how many hours are required! What is included in that cost? Tables & chairs *linens are not included*Use of our private, gated parking lot, in downtown Mount DoraUse of our ballroom, deck, and bar All bar glassware is included with the price of the bartendersWe can provide music and lighting for no additional costUse of our fully commercial kitchen is included as well *with use of a licensed and insured caterer* Does the venue provide catering and bar service? If so, what is the average cost per person? We do not, but we have a fully commercial kitchen, and a caterer we use each week who is very talented and always open to booking. We also have a list of caterers to suggest, but the nicest part is we donâ€™t â€œrequireâ€ you to use someone on that list. If they plan to use the kitchen, they must be licensed and insured, but if youâ€™re looking to just do platters on your own, we can accommodate that too! We pride ourselves on our flexibility. Do you require wedding insurance? We do require event insurance. Why do couples choose this location? Its a gorgeous, newly renovated, lakefront venue with private parking in historic downtown Mount Dora. We pride ourselves on our view, so come see for yourself! We love giving tours! What are the top three venue features? The viewThe parking lotThe new renovatiovated ballroom What other types of events does the venue host? We host all types of events!Weâ€™ve done sweet sixteens, birthday parties, celebrations of life, holiday parties (we decorate beautifully each yeah for Christmas), and company events! Weâ€™ve done a little of everything! General Manager Chelsea Bromley Hi there! Iâ€™m Chelsea, and I get to show off one of Mount Doraâ€™s best-kept secrets.. our gorgeous waterfront venue! I love helping guests imagine their events here, and answering all your party â€œwhat ifs!â€ Whether youâ€™re envisioning sunset vows or a lively reception in our hall, Iâ€™m here to help you see how our space can bring your celebration to life. Iâ€™ll show you around, answer your questions, and make booking simple and stress-free so you can picture your perfect day by the water. â™¡ Mount Dora Yacht Club Reviews 0 Reviews Write a Review Î” Use the form below to write your review and share your experience with other couples.
